Airplane Shot Animate GIF

,,

It was a nervous feeling in the beginning.

,

It was the 1st time having to capture photographs of fast moving jet fights plane.

,,

Using a Telephoto Lens 200mm,

,

with eyeball looking through the EVF was challenging to locate those fast and noisy planes

item.title: Once Upon a time, there was a nonchalant boy, people never agree his art work
item.description:
Once Upon a time, there was a nonchalant boy, people never agree his art work

,

The best photograph is not merely documenting the scene at hand but it is through infusing the essential vision of the beholder

,

How we see a piece of photo is a very personal thing.

,

The most important quality of a photograph is to evoke an emotional response.
